instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no data on sata shows no entrance sign when booting to system
threads.message: tried with many cables and hard drives but i can hear like if it doesn't get enough power to read the data, kind of klicking sound on a known good drive. 99.9% board issue..where to start?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no data on sata shows no entrance sign when booting to system
threads.message: Does HD spins????? If yes, check for missing cap on data lines, 4 data lines from connector to <CHIP>U4510</CHIP> and 4 data lines from <CHIP>U4510</CHIP> to PCH... If does not spin check voltaje on pin 1 from J4501

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no data on sata shows no entrance sign when booting to system
threads.message: If it gets the "no entry" sign it IS reading the HDD. You have the wrong OS installed or it is corrupted.
